name: Geometry Maze
description:
Geometry Maze is a minimalistic, yet challenging action puzzle game with a neon glow. You must maneuver the orb from the start to the exit of each maze. Formulate the best route within the mazes to complete levels as quickly as you can!

  • 16 simple, yet challenging levels that will test your reflexes and maneuverability skills
  • Fun and addicting gameplay will keep you coming back for more! 
  • Toe tapping Techno tunes
  • Complete levels as fast as you can for the best times. Show off your speedrunning skills to your friends! 

Controls

Use 'WASD' or the arrow keys to move around.
